content:
I have heard from people asking where to find wasi-cloud-core proposal. Currently it lives in an issue in WASI repo. Would it make it more conveninet for people if we have a repo called wasi-cloud-core in the wasm org or in the BCA org? In addition, it could be place of discussion and a place to raise issues. @Bailey Hayes

A wasi-cloud-core World proposal · Issue #520 · WebAssembly/WASI
This follows the footstep of #509 and a few discussions in WASI subgroup meetings, we want to create a World for all the wasi-cloud proposals and name it as wasi-cloud-core. This includes wasi-keyv...

the way to get a repo is to present the proposal at a WASI meeting and ask for stage 1, as described here

WASI/Contributing.md at main · WebAssembly/WASI
WebAssembly System Interface. Contribute to WebAssembly/WASI development by creating an account on GitHub.
(personally, I think that'd be a great step!)
@Till Schneidereit the wasi-cloud-core proposal has officially been approved to move to stage 1! Are we good to create a host implementation repo in the BCA?
